generator.name: BOA health generator
generator.description: Generator for providing reporting about the health of the BOA system

generator.name: Ingestion control generator (Complete view)
generator.description: Generator for providing reporting about the ingestion chain of the BOA system

generator.name: Ingestion control generator (Alerts/Errors view)
generator.description: Generator for providing reporting about alerts and errors impacting the ingestion chain of the BOA system

generator.name: Reporting control generator (Complete view)
generator.description: Generator for providing reporting about the reporting chain of the BOA system

generator.name: Reporting control generator (Alerts/Errors view)
generator.description: Generator for providing reporting about alerts and errors impacting the reporting chain of the BOA system

generator.name: Mission planning generator (Complete view)
generator.description: Generator of the mission planning report covering all missions, all ground stations and EDRS

generator.name: Acquisition completeness generator (Complete view)
generator.description: Generator of the acquisition completeness report covering all missions, all ground station and EDRS

generator.name: Acquisition completeness generator (Anomalies/Alerts view)
generator.description: Generator of the acquisition completeness report covering all missions, all ground station and EDRS and reporting only anomalies and alerts

generator.name: HKTM workflow status generator (Complete view)
generator.description: Generator of the HKTM workflow status report covering all missions

generator.name: HKTM workflow status generator (Anomalies/Alerts view)
generator.description: Generator of the HKTM workflow status report covering all missions, reporting only anomalies and alerts

generator.name: Data availability in DHUS generator (Complete view)
generator.description: Generator of the DHUS completeness report covering all missions and all levels

generator.name: Data availability in DHUS generator (Anomalies/Alerts view)
generator.description: Generator of the DHUS completeness report covering all missions and all levels and reporting only anomalies and alerts

generator.name: Sensing data volumes generator (Complete view)
generator.description: Generator of the Sensing data volumes report covering all missions

generator.name: Archive data volumes generator (Complete view)
generator.description: Generator of the Archive data volumes report covering all missions
